texts.label: text
texts.orig: Document Version: 2.1 Date: November 10, 2025 Classification: Internal Use
texts.text: Document Version: 2.1 Date: November 10, 2025 Classification: Internal Use

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This section defines key terminology used across NOVACOM's data warehouse and business operations.  These  terms  ensure  consistent  understanding  across  teams  including  billing, customer service, network operations, and analytics.
texts.text: This section defines key terminology used across NOVACOM's data warehouse and business operations.  These  terms  ensure  consistent  understanding  across  teams  including  billing, customer service, network operations, and analytics.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A  key  performance  indicator  calculated  as  total  revenue  divided  by  the  number  of  active subscribers during a given period. ARPU helps measure the revenue-generating capability of the  customer  base.  Calculated  monthly  and  annually.  Linked  to  CRM_CUSTOMERS  and BIL_INVOICES tables.
texts.text: A  key  performance  indicator  calculated  as  total  revenue  divided  by  the  number  of  active subscribers during a given period. ARPU helps measure the revenue-generating capability of the  customer  base.  Calculated  monthly  and  annually.  Linked  to  CRM_CUSTOMERS  and BIL_INVOICES tables.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The  percentage  of  customers  who  discontinue  service  during  a  specific  time  period. Calculated as (Customers Lost / Total Customers at Start of Period) × 100. A critical metric for business  health.  High  churn  rates  indicate  customer  satisfaction  issues.  Derived  from CRM_CUSTOMERS.STATUS and PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS.END_DATE fields.
texts.text: The  percentage  of  customers  who  discontinue  service  during  a  specific  time  period. Calculated as (Customers Lost / Total Customers at Start of Period) × 100. A critical metric for business  health.  High  churn  rates  indicate  customer  satisfaction  issues.  Derived  from CRM_CUSTOMERS.STATUS and PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS.END_DATE fields.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The  predictable  revenue  stream  generated  from  active  service  subscriptions  each  month. Excludes one-time charges and usage-based fees. Calculated by summing PRV_SERVICES.MONTHLY_COST for all active PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS. Foundation for financial forecasting and valuation.
texts.text: The  predictable  revenue  stream  generated  from  active  service  subscriptions  each  month. Excludes one-time charges and usage-based fees. Calculated by summing PRV_SERVICES.MONTHLY_COST for all active PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS. Foundation for financial forecasting and valuation.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The provisioning of a specific telecommunications service to a customer for a defined period. Tracked  in  PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS  table.  Each  assignment  links  a  customer (CRM_CUSTOMERS) to a service offering (PRV_SERVICES) with start date, end date, and provisioning status.
texts.text: The provisioning of a specific telecommunications service to a customer for a defined period. Tracked  in  PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS  table.  Each  assignment  links  a  customer (CRM_CUSTOMERS) to a service offering (PRV_SERVICES) with start date, end date, and provisioning status.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The technical process of configuring and activating network services for a customer. Includes equipment  setup,  network  configuration,  and  service  enablement.  Status  tracked  through PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS.PROVISIONING_STATUS field with values: Pending, Provisioned, Failed.
texts.text: The technical process of configuring and activating network services for a customer. Includes equipment  setup,  network  configuration,  and  service  enablement.  Status  tracked  through PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS.PROVISIONING_STATUS field with values: Pending, Provisioned, Failed.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The  percentage  of  time  that  network  services  are  operational  and  available  to  customers. Calculated as ((Total Time -Outage Time) / Total Time) × 100. Measured from NWK_OUTAGES data. Critical for SLA compliance and customer satisfaction.
texts.text: The  percentage  of  time  that  network  services  are  operational  and  available  to  customers. Calculated as ((Total Time -Outage Time) / Total Time) × 100. Measured from NWK_OUTAGES data. Critical for SLA compliance and customer satisfaction.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: High-level  categorization  of  customers  into  distinct  groups  based  on  business  model  and service  needs.  Values  include  Business  (B2B  enterprise  customers)  and  Consumer  (B2C residential customers). Stored in CRM_CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_SEGMENT. Drives pricing strategies and service offerings.
texts.text: High-level  categorization  of  customers  into  distinct  groups  based  on  business  model  and service  needs.  Values  include  Business  (B2B  enterprise  customers)  and  Consumer  (B2C residential customers). Stored in CRM_CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_SEGMENT. Drives pricing strategies and service offerings.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A ranking system that classifies customers based on value, loyalty, or service level. Common tiers:  Gold  (premium  customers  with  highest  value),  Silver  (mid-tier  customers),  Bronze (standard customers). Stored in CRM_CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_TIER. Influences support priority and promotional offerings.
texts.text: A ranking system that classifies customers based on value, loyalty, or service level. Common tiers:  Gold  (premium  customers  with  highest  value),  Silver  (mid-tier  customers),  Bronze (standard customers). Stored in CRM_CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMER_TIER. Influences support priority and promotional offerings.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: An individual charge entry on a customer invoice representing a specific product, service, or fee. Each line item includes quantity, unit price, discounts, and taxes. Stored BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS. Multiple line items aggregate to form the total invoice amount.
texts.text: An individual charge entry on a customer invoice representing a specific product, service, or fee. Each line item includes quantity, unit price, discounts, and taxes. Stored BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS. Multiple line items aggregate to form the total invoice amount.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A  unique  hardware  identifier  assigned  to  network  equipment  for  device  identification  and tracking. Format: six groups of two hexadecimal digits (e.g., 00:1B:44:11:3A:B7). Stored in NWK_EQUIPMENT.MAC_ADDRESS.  Essential  for  network  management  and  equipment inventory.
texts.text: A  unique  hardware  identifier  assigned  to  network  equipment  for  device  identification  and tracking. Format: six groups of two hexadecimal digits (e.g., 00:1B:44:11:3A:B7). Stored in NWK_EQUIPMENT.MAC_ADDRESS.  Essential  for  network  management  and  equipment inventory.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A  contractual  commitment  defining  expected  service  quality  metrics  including  uptime guarantees, response times, and resolution timeframes. Typical telecom SLA: 99.9% uptime (43  minutes  downtime/month).  Violations  may  trigger  service  credits.  Measured  against NWK_OUTAGES and SUP_TICKETS data.
texts.text: A  contractual  commitment  defining  expected  service  quality  metrics  including  uptime guarantees, response times, and resolution timeframes. Typical telecom SLA: 99.9% uptime (43  minutes  downtime/month).  Violations  may  trigger  service  credits.  Measured  against NWK_OUTAGES and SUP_TICKETS data.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The  predicted  total  revenue  a  customer  will  generate  throughout  their  relationship  with NOVACOM.  Calculated  as  (Average  Monthly  Revenue  ×  Average  Customer  Lifespan  in Months) - Customer Acquisition Cost. Key metric for marketing ROI and customer retention investment decisions.
texts.text: The  predicted  total  revenue  a  customer  will  generate  throughout  their  relationship  with NOVACOM.  Calculated  as  (Average  Monthly  Revenue  ×  Average  Customer  Lifespan  in Months) - Customer Acquisition Cost. Key metric for marketing ROI and customer retention investment decisions.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: These rules define validation logic, business constraints, and data quality requirements that must  be  enforced  across  NOVACOM's  systems.  All  rules  are  mandatory  unless  marked optional.
texts.text: These rules define validation logic, business constraints, and data quality requirements that must  be  enforced  across  NOVACOM's  systems.  All  rules  are  mandatory  unless  marked optional.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Every invoice (BIL_INVOICES) must have at least one associated line (BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS). An invoice cannot exist without billing details. COUNT(BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS  WHERE  INVOICE_ID  =  X)  >=  1  for  each  BIL_INVOICES record. System should reject invoice creation if no line items are present.
texts.text: Every invoice (BIL_INVOICES) must have at least one associated line (BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS). An invoice cannot exist without billing details. COUNT(BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS  WHERE  INVOICE_ID  =  X)  >=  1  for  each  BIL_INVOICES record. System should reject invoice creation if no line items are present.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The  TOTAL_AMOUNT  on  BIL_INVOICES  must  equal  the  sum  of  all  LINE_TOTAL  values from  associated  BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS  before  applying  invoice-level  discounts  and  taxes. Formula: TOTAL_AMOUNT = SUM(LINE_TOTAL) -DISCOUNT_AMOUNT + TAX_AMOUNT. Discrepancies indicate data corruption or calculation errors.
texts.text: The  TOTAL_AMOUNT  on  BIL_INVOICES  must  equal  the  sum  of  all  LINE_TOTAL  values from  associated  BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS  before  applying  invoice-level  discounts  and  taxes. Formula: TOTAL_AMOUNT = SUM(LINE_TOTAL) -DISCOUNT_AMOUNT + TAX_AMOUNT. Discrepancies indicate data corruption or calculation errors.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A  payment  (BIL_PAYMENTS.AMOUNT)  cannot  exceed  the  remaining  balance  on  its associated  invoice.  Validation:  SUM(payments.AMOUNT)  <=  invoice.TOTAL_AMOUNT  for each INVOICE_ID. Overpayments must be rejected or applied as account credit. Prevents financial discrepancies.
texts.text: A  payment  (BIL_PAYMENTS.AMOUNT)  cannot  exceed  the  remaining  balance  on  its associated  invoice.  Validation:  SUM(payments.AMOUNT)  <=  invoice.TOTAL_AMOUNT  for each INVOICE_ID. Overpayments must be rejected or applied as account credit. Prevents financial discrepancies.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: All  discount  rates  in  BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.DISCOUNT_RATE  must  be  stored  as  decimal fractions between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. For example, a 15% discount = 0.15. Values outside [0, 1] are invalid. Validation: DISCOUNT_RATE >= 0 AND DISCOUNT_RATE <= 1.
texts.text: All  discount  rates  in  BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.DISCOUNT_RATE  must  be  stored  as  decimal fractions between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. For example, a 15% discount = 0.15. Values outside [0, 1] are invalid. Validation: DISCOUNT_RATE >= 0 AND DISCOUNT_RATE <= 1.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Tax rates (BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.TAX_RATE) must fall within acceptable bounds: 0.0 to 0.5 (0-50%). Standard rates: 0.05 (5%), 0.10 (10%), 0.20 (20%). Rates above 50% likely indicate data entry errors or incorrect decimal conversion. Validate: TAX_RATE >= 0 AND TAX_RATE <= 0.5.
texts.text: Tax rates (BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.TAX_RATE) must fall within acceptable bounds: 0.0 to 0.5 (0-50%). Standard rates: 0.05 (5%), 0.10 (10%), 0.20 (20%). Rates above 50% likely indicate data entry errors or incorrect decimal conversion. Validate: TAX_RATE >= 0 AND TAX_RATE <= 0.5.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A service assignment (PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS) can only be created for customers with STATUS = 'Active' in CRM_CUSTOMERS table. Inactive customers cannot receive new services.  Additionally,  the  service  (PRV_SERVICES)  must  have  ACTIVE_FLAG  =  true. Validate both conditions before assignment creation.
texts.text: A service assignment (PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS) can only be created for customers with STATUS = 'Active' in CRM_CUSTOMERS table. Inactive customers cannot receive new services.  Additionally,  the  service  (PRV_SERVICES)  must  have  ACTIVE_FLAG  =  true. Validate both conditions before assignment creation.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For any service assignment, START_DATE must precede END_DATE when END_DATE is not null. Active assignments have NULL END_DATE. Validation: END_DATE IS NULL OR END_DATE > START_DATE. Historical data integrity requires proper date ordering for billing and reporting accuracy.
texts.text: For any service assignment, START_DATE must precede END_DATE when END_DATE is not null. Active assignments have NULL END_DATE. Validation: END_DATE IS NULL OR END_DATE > START_DATE. Historical data integrity requires proper date ordering for billing and reporting accuracy.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: All resolved outages (NWK_OUTAGES) must have END_TIME greater than START_TIME. The duration in minutes is calculated as TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, START_TIME, END_TIME). Negative or zero durations indicate data errors. Validation: END_TIME IS NULL OR END_TIME > START_TIME.
texts.text: All resolved outages (NWK_OUTAGES) must have END_TIME greater than START_TIME. The duration in minutes is calculated as TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, START_TIME, END_TIME). Negative or zero durations indicate data errors. Validation: END_TIME IS NULL OR END_TIME > START_TIME.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Critical priority support tickets (SUP_TICKETS.PRIORITY = 'High') must be resolved within 4 hours of creation. Calculate: TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, CREATED_AT, RESOLUTION_DATE) <= 4. Violations trigger automated escalation to management and may result in service credits to affected customers.
texts.text: Critical priority support tickets (SUP_TICKETS.PRIORITY = 'High') must be resolved within 4 hours of creation. Calculate: TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, CREATED_AT, RESOLUTION_DATE) <= 4. Violations trigger automated escalation to management and may result in service credits to affected customers.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Each customer (CRM_CUSTOMERS) must have exactly one primary contact method marked with  IS_PRIMARY  =  true  in  CRM_CONTACTS.  Validation:  COUNT(CRM_CONTACTS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = X AND IS_PRIMARY = true) = 1. Multiple primary contacts or zero primary contacts violate data integrity.
texts.text: Each customer (CRM_CUSTOMERS) must have exactly one primary contact method marked with  IS_PRIMARY  =  true  in  CRM_CONTACTS.  Validation:  COUNT(CRM_CONTACTS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = X AND IS_PRIMARY = true) = 1. Multiple primary contacts or zero primary contacts violate data integrity.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Network  equipment  (NWK_EQUIPMENT)  can  only  be  assigned  to  service  assignments (PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS) where PROVISIONING_STATUS = 'Provisioned'. Equipment cannot be allocated to pending or failed assignments. Validate: ASSIGNMENT_ID exists in PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS with PROVISIONING_STATUS = 'Provisioned'.
texts.text: Network  equipment  (NWK_EQUIPMENT)  can  only  be  assigned  to  service  assignments (PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS) where PROVISIONING_STATUS = 'Provisioned'. Equipment cannot be allocated to pending or failed assignments. Validate: ASSIGNMENT_ID exists in PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS with PROVISIONING_STATUS = 'Provisioned'.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: NOVACOM  tracks  the  following  metrics  to  measure  business  performance,  operational efficiency,  and  customer  satisfaction.  Metrics  are  calculated  daily,  weekly,  or  monthly depending on business needs.
texts.text: NOVACOM  tracks  the  following  metrics  to  measure  business  performance,  operational efficiency,  and  customer  satisfaction.  Metrics  are  calculated  daily,  weekly,  or  monthly depending on business needs.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Total predictable monthly revenue from active service subscriptions.
texts.text: Total predictable monthly revenue from active service subscriptions.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: SUM(PRV_SERVICES.MONTHLY_COST) for all PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS where STATUS = 'Active' and END_DATE IS NULL
texts.text: Formula: SUM(PRV_SERVICES.MONTHLY_COST) for all PRV_SERVICE_ASSIGNMENTS where STATUS = 'Active' and END_DATE IS NULL

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Percentage of customers who canceled service during the month.
texts.text: Percentage of customers who canceled service during the month.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: (COUNT(customers with END_DATE in current month) / COUNT(customers active at start of month)) × 100
texts.text: Formula: (COUNT(customers with END_DATE in current month) / COUNT(customers active at start of month)) × 100

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Average monthly revenue generated per active customer.
texts.text: Average monthly revenue generated per active customer.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: Total Monthly Revenue / COUNT(active CRM_CUSTOMERS)
texts.text: Formula: Total Monthly Revenue / COUNT(active CRM_CUSTOMERS)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Percentage of time network services were available (non-outage time).
texts.text: Percentage of time network services were available (non-outage time).

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: ((Total Minutes in Period - SUM(outage duration)) / Total Minutes in Period) × 100
texts.text: Formula: ((Total Minutes in Period - SUM(outage duration)) / Total Minutes in Period) × 100

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Average cost to acquire a new customer through marketing campaigns.
texts.text: Average cost to acquire a new customer through marketing campaigns.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: SUM(MKT_CAMPAIGNS.BUDGET) / COUNT(new customers acquired in period)
texts.text: Formula: SUM(MKT_CAMPAIGNS.BUDGET) / COUNT(new customers acquired in period)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Mean time (in hours) to resolve customer support tickets.
texts.text: Mean time (in hours) to resolve customer support tickets.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, CREATED_AT, RESOLUTION_DATE)) for closed SUP_TICKETS
texts.text: Formula: AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, CREATED_AT, RESOLUTION_DATE)) for closed SUP_TICKETS

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Percentage of service assignments successfully provisioned on first attempt.
texts.text: Percentage of service assignments successfully provisioned on first attempt.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Percentage of invoice amounts successfully collected through payments.
texts.text: Percentage of invoice amounts successfully collected through payments.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Percentage of network capacity currently in use based on data consumption.
texts.text: Percentage of network capacity currently in use based on data consumption.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Predicted total revenue from a customer over their entire relationship with NOVACOM.
texts.text: Predicted total revenue from a customer over their entire relationship with NOVACOM.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: (ARPU × Average Customer Lifespan in Months) - CAC Referenced Entities: BIL_INVOICES, CRM_CUSTOMERS, MKT_CAMPAIGNS
texts.text: Formula: (ARPU × Average Customer Lifespan in Months) - CAC Referenced Entities: BIL_INVOICES, CRM_CUSTOMERS, MKT_CAMPAIGNS

texts.label: text
texts.orig: These  calculations  derive  new  data  points  from  existing  fields.  They  are  essential  for analytics, reporting, and business intelligence. Calculations should be implemented consistently across all systems.
texts.text: These  calculations  derive  new  data  points  from  existing  fields.  They  are  essential  for analytics, reporting, and business intelligence. Calculations should be implemented consistently across all systems.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the total charge for a single invoice line item after quantity, discount, and tax.
texts.text: Calculate the total charge for a single invoice line item after quantity, discount, and tax.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Required Fields: BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, DISCOUNT_RATE, TAX_RATE
texts.text: Required Fields: BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, DISCOUNT_RATE, TAX_RATE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: Used for invoice generation and financial reporting.
texts.text: Business Use: Used for invoice generation and financial reporting.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the final amount due on an invoice including all line items, discounts, and taxes.
texts.text: Calculate the final amount due on an invoice including all line items, discounts, and taxes.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: GRAND_TOTAL = SUM(BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.LINE_TOTAL for invoice) -BIL_INVOICES.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT + BIL_INVOICES.TAX_AMOUNT
texts.text: Formula: GRAND_TOTAL = SUM(BIL_INVOICE_ITEMS.LINE_TOTAL for invoice) -BIL_INVOICES.DISCOUNT_AMOUNT + BIL_INVOICES.TAX_AMOUNT

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: This is the amount the customer must pay. Should BIL_INVOICES.TOTAL_AMOUNT.
texts.text: Business Use: This is the amount the customer must pay. Should BIL_INVOICES.TOTAL_AMOUNT.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the remaining unpaid balance on an invoice after applying all payments.
texts.text: Calculate the remaining unpaid balance on an invoice after applying all payments.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: OUTSTANDING_BALANCE = BIL_INVOICES.TOTAL_AMOUNT -SUM(BIL_PAYMENTS.AMOUNT WHERE INVOICE_ID = X)
texts.text: Formula: OUTSTANDING_BALANCE = BIL_INVOICES.TOTAL_AMOUNT -SUM(BIL_PAYMENTS.AMOUNT WHERE INVOICE_ID = X)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Used for accounts receivable tracking and collection processes.
texts.text: Used for accounts receivable tracking and collection processes.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the length of a network outage in minutes from start to end timestamps.
texts.text: Calculate the length of a network outage in minutes from start to end timestamps.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: Used for SLA compliance reporting and network reliability metrics.
texts.text: Business Use: Used for SLA compliance reporting and network reliability metrics.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate how long a service assignment has been or was active.
texts.text: Calculate how long a service assignment has been or was active.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: For active assignments, END_DATE is NULL so current date is used. Used for billing periods.
texts.text: Business Use: For active assignments, END_DATE is NULL so current date is used. Used for billing periods.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the number of months since a customer first joined NOVACOM.
texts.text: Calculate the number of months since a customer first joined NOVACOM.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business  Use: Used  for  customer  segmentation,  loyalty  programs,  and  churn  prediction models.
texts.text: Business  Use: Used  for  customer  segmentation,  loyalty  programs,  and  churn  prediction models.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate how long it took to resolve a support ticket from creation to resolution.
texts.text: Calculate how long it took to resolve a support ticket from creation to resolution.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business  Use: NULL  if  ticket  is  still  open.  Used  for  SLA  compliance  and  support  team performance metrics.
texts.text: Business  Use: NULL  if  ticket  is  still  open.  Used  for  SLA  compliance  and  support  team performance metrics.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate return on investment for a marketing campaign.
texts.text: Calculate return on investment for a marketing campaign.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: CAMPAIGN_ROI = ((Revenue from Campaign - Campaign Cost) / Campaign Cost) × 100
texts.text: Formula: CAMPAIGN_ROI = ((Revenue from Campaign - Campaign Cost) / Campaign Cost) × 100

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Required  Fields: Revenue  calculation  uses  MKT_CAMPAIGN_TARGETS.CUSTOMER_ID linked to BIL_INVOICES, compared to MKT_CAMPAIGNS.BUDGET
texts.text: Required  Fields: Revenue  calculation  uses  MKT_CAMPAIGN_TARGETS.CUSTOMER_ID linked to BIL_INVOICES, compared to MKT_CAMPAIGNS.BUDGET

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: Measures marketing effectiveness. Positive ROI indicates profitable campaigns.
texts.text: Business Use: Measures marketing effectiveness. Positive ROI indicates profitable campaigns.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate the effective cost per gigabyte of data consumed by a service.
texts.text: Calculate the effective cost per gigabyte of data consumed by a service.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business Use: Used for pricing analysis and capacity planning. Helps identify cost-effective usage patterns.
texts.text: Business Use: Used for pricing analysis and capacity planning. Helps identify cost-effective usage patterns.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Calculate average number of days between invoice date and payment date for a customer.
texts.text: Calculate average number of days between invoice date and payment date for a customer.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Formula: AVG_PAYMENT_DAYS  =  AVG(DATEDIFF(BIL_PAYMENTS.PAYMENT_DATE, BIL_INVOICES.INVOICE_DATE)) per customer
texts.text: Formula: AVG_PAYMENT_DAYS  =  AVG(DATEDIFF(BIL_PAYMENTS.PAYMENT_DATE, BIL_INVOICES.INVOICE_DATE)) per customer

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Required Fields: BIL_INVOICES.INVOICE_DATE, BIL_PAYMENTS.PAYMENT_DATE, joined by INVOICE_ID
texts.text: Required Fields: BIL_INVOICES.INVOICE_DATE, BIL_PAYMENTS.PAYMENT_DATE, joined by INVOICE_ID

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Business  Use: Identifies  fast-paying  vs  slow-paying  customers.  Used  for  credit  risk assessment.
texts.text: Business  Use: Identifies  fast-paying  vs  slow-paying  customers.  Used  for  credit  risk assessment.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The NOVACOM data warehouse consists of interconnected subject areas covering Customer Relationship  Management  (CRM),  Billing  (BIL),  Provisioning  (PRV),  Network  Operations (NWK), Marketing (MKT), and Support (SUP). All definitions, rules, metrics, and calculations in this document reference entities and attributes from the following subject areas:
texts.text: The NOVACOM data warehouse consists of interconnected subject areas covering Customer Relationship  Management  (CRM),  Billing  (BIL),  Provisioning  (PRV),  Network  Operations (NWK), Marketing (MKT), and Support (SUP). All definitions, rules, metrics, and calculations in this document reference entities and attributes from the following subject areas:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Document  Control: This  document  should  be  updated  whenever  new  business  rules, metrics, or definitions are added to the NOVACOM data model. Version history and change requests should be tracked through the data governance process.
texts.text: Document  Control: This  document  should  be  updated  whenever  new  business  rules, metrics, or definitions are added to the NOVACOM data model. Version history and change requests should be tracked through the data governance process.

table_cells.text: CRM_CUSTOMERS, CRM_ACCOUNTS, CRM_CONTACTS, CRM_OPPORTUNITIES Customer master data, relationships, sales pipeli
BIL_PAYMENTS Invoice generation, line items, payment tracking
Equipment tracking, outage management, usage moni
